text: KOPE (88.9 FM) is an American radio station licensed by the FCC to serve the community of Eldorado, Texas. The station license is assigned to The Center for Education Nonprofit Corp. KOPE airs a jazz format. The station has held the KOPE callsign since September 21, 2009. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * Category:Radio stations in Texas Category:Radio stations established in 2009 Category:2009 establishments in Texas Category:Jazz radio stations in the United States Category:Schleicher County, Texas
title: KOPE
